ðŸ“– Summary: The YouTube to Blog application automatically converts YouTube videos into well-structured blog posts using AI. It extracts video metadata and transcripts, then uses Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash to transform the content into professional MDX blog posts, which are then saved to a database.
